    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085962</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Citing sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zitieren von von Quellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citation des sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Citing fontes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Citazione delle sorgenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναφορά των πηγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Citación de fuentes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A guide for high school students to citing sources from print and the web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anleitung für High School Kursteilnehmer 
zum Zitieren von von Quellen vom Druck und vom Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide pour des étudiants de lycée à citer 
des sources de copie et du Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia para estudantes da High School a citing 
fontes da cópia e do Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida per gli allievi della High School a 
citare le sorgenti dalla stampa e dal Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας οδηγός για τους σπουδαστές γυμνασίου στην 
αναφορά των πηγών από την τυπωμένη ύλη και τον Ιστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía para los estudiantes de la High School 
secundaria a citar fuentes de la impresión y del Web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
